item.title: Downtown Roanoke Food, History & Cultural Tour
item.description: Discover Roanoke’s food, history, architecture and culture on this 3-hour, small-group walking tour. Try up to seven food tastings from local restaurants and specialty food shops. Visit the Hotel Roanoke, one of the top historic hotels in the US, plus Cedars Lebanese Restaurant, the famed Texas Tavern, and the most locally sourced downtown restaurant. Along the way, uncover hidden gems, iconic landmarks, back alleys and the Star City’s colorful history.

image.alt: Downtown Roanoke Food, History & Cultural Tour

item.title: 3-Hour E-Bike Sightseeing and Breweries Tour in Roanoke
item.description: See the best of Roanoke without breaking a sweat on this small-group e-bike tour. Check out vistas of the Blue Ridge mountains, head into downtown Roanoke, and ride the Mill Mountain greenway trails. Bikes, helmets, and beers are all included, so you just need to show up ready for a fun afternoon in Roanoke.

image.alt: 3-Hour E-Bike Sightseeing and Breweries Tour in Roanoke

item.title: 2-Hour Roanoke River Tube Rental with Shuttle
item.description:
Scenic Beauty: The Roanoke River offers stunning scenic views, with its gentle waters winding through the picturesque landscapes of the Roanoke Valley. The surrounding Blue Ridge Mountains add to the natural beauty of the area.
Accessibility: Tubing on the Roanoke River is relatively easy to access, as there are several entry and exit points along the river.
Family-Friendly: Tubing on the Roanoke River is a family-friendly activity that caters to people of all ages. The calm waters and slow-moving currents make it suitable for children and beginners, ensuring a fun and safe experience for everyone. It's an excellent choice for those seeking a leisurely float down the river to unwind and enjoy the surroundings.
Wildlife Viewing: The Roanoke River is home to a diverse range of wildlife, including various bird species, fish, and other creatures. While tubing, visitors often get opportunities to observe and appreciate nature up close.

image.alt: 2-Hour Roanoke River Tube Rental with Shuttle

item.title: Scenic Blue Ridge Parkway Self-Guided Driving Audio Tour
item.description: Enjoy both the freedom of independent travel and the structure of a guided tour with a self-guided driving tour of the Blue Ridge Parkway. Download the app and get started from your own vehicle in Cherokee, Asheville, Roanoke, or Afton. Admire the views and look out for wildlife en route between the Great Smokies National Park and Shenandoah. Start and stop whenever you like as you’re in control.

image.alt: Scenic Blue Ridge Parkway Self-Guided Driving Audio Tour

item.location: Great Smoky Mountains National Park, Tennessee

item.title: Roanoke River Greenway E-bike Rental
item.description:
The Roanoke River Greenway winds its way along the picturesque Roanoke River, offering stunning views of the water & surrounding woodlands.
The Roanoke River Greenway features a mix of flat, paved paths and slightly more challenging sections, making it suitable for riders of all levels.
Electric bikes provide assistance with pedaling, making it easier to cover longer distances and navigate inclines, ensuring that everyone can enjoy the beauty of the greenway without feeling exhausted.
The Greenway connects to other trails and outdoor attractions in the area, providing endless opportunities for exploration.
Overall, e-biking on the Roanoke River Greenway offers an exciting and unique way to experience the beauty, history, and culture of the Roanoke area. Whether you're a local resident or a visitor to the region, exploring the greenway on an electric bike is sure to be a memorable and enjoyable adventure.

item.title: Mountain Bike Tour from The Roanoke Star
item.description:
Professional Guides: Each bike ride is led by a certified and experienced guide who knows the trails intimately. They'll not only ensure your safety but also provide valuable instruction.
Tailored to You: Whether you're a complete novice or an experienced mountain biker. Your guide will assess your skill level and preferences to choose a descent that matches your abilities and interests. RMA can provide high-quality mountain bikes from Marin and helmets to ensure you have a smooth and enjoyable ride.
Amazing Trails & Views: The top of Mill Mt offers the best views in all of Roanoke Whether you're looking for a serene ride through lush forests or a heart-pounding descent down rugged terrain, you'll find it here.
Safety First: Your safety is paramount. Guides are trained in first aid and they carry first aid equipment. They'll provide thorough instruction before and during the ride.

image.alt: Mountain Bike Tour from The Roanoke Star

item.title: 3-Hour Guided Mountain Biking in the Blue Ridge Mountains
item.description:
Professional Guides: Each guided mountain bike ride is led by a certified and experienced guide who knows the trails intimately. They'll not only ensure your safety but also provide valuable instruction.
Tailored to You: Whether you're a complete novice or an experienced mountain biker. Your guide will assess your skill level and preferences to choose a trail that matches your abilities and interests. RMA can provide high-quality mountain bikes from Marin and helmets to ensure you have a smooth and enjoyable ride.
Amazing Trails: Roanoke is nestled in the heart of the Blue Ridge Mountains, providing access to some of the most breathtaking trails on the East Coast. Whether you're looking for a serene ride through lush forests or a heart-pounding descent down rugged terrain, you'll find it here.
Safety First: Your safety is paramount. Guides are trained in first aid and they carry first aid equipment. They'll provide thorough instruction before and during the ride.

image.alt: 3-Hour Guided Mountain Biking in the Blue Ridge Mountains

item.title: Roanoke River Greenway Bike Rental
item.description: Take off right from our shop to cruise the easygoing Roanoke River Greenway. We're roughly in the middle of the 14-mile Roanoke River Greenway, which connects riders to the Grandin neighborhood, South Roanoke, Mill Mountain and more along the scenic Roanoke River. Choose between a comfort cruiser, a more adventurous flat bar hybrid or an electric bike! Looking to take the whole family? You can bundle greenway bikes, e-bikes, tow-behind trailers, kids bikes and or kid's seats. All bikes come with helmets and if you plan on stopping along your ride, we can provide a bike lock.

item.title: Kayaking on the Roanoke River
item.description:
The River Adventure: The water flows gently, creating a relaxing and enjoyable experience. Throughout the journey, kayakers will encounter various Class I rapids, providing a bit of excitement without being overly challenging.
Scenic Views and Wildlife: Keep an eye out for frequent wildlife sightings, including blue herons, bald eagles, turtles, deer, and various fish species. The opportunity to connect with nature amidst the urban setting is a unique and rewarding aspect of this kayaking adventure.
Community and Culture: As the kayaking route meanders through the heart of Roanoke, paddlers will pass by charming neighborhoods and urban scenes. The river seamlessly blends the natural environment with the city's vibrant culture, creating a distinctive and memorable experience.

item.title: Blue Ridge Parkway (Roanoke to Afton) Self-Guided Audio Tour
item.description:
Explore the Blue Ridge Parkway from Roanoke, the Star City of the South, to Afton. This renowned path reveals lush scenery and dazzling rivers in blue mists. From the breathtaking Roanoke Valley Overlook to the serene Fallingwater Cascades, the trip is a natural ballet. Historical Appalachian whispers meet spectacular sites like the Peaks of Otter. Explore the southeast's rich culture, history, and natural beauty!
Purchase one tour per car, not per person. Everyone listens together!
After booking, check your email to download the separate Audio Tour Guide App by Action, enter your unique password, and access your tour. These steps require good internet/Wi-Fi access. From there, follow the audio instructions and the route.
New, extra validity — now yours for an entire year! Use multiple times over multiple trips!
This isn't an entrance ticket. Check opening hours before your visit.

image.alt: Blue Ridge Parkway (Roanoke to Afton) Self-Guided Audio Tour

item.title: E-Bike Mural Tour of Roanoke
item.description:
This isn’t just another bike ride—this is an immersive experience that brings Roanoke’s creative heart to life. The murals are more than just beautiful images on walls—they reflect the city’s story. With local artists guiding you, you’ll gain an insider’s perspective on Roanoke’s art scene and the incredible talent behind the murals.
Safety First: Our top priority is ensuring you have a safe and enjoyable ride. The tour is designed to be fun but manageable, with ample time before we depart to build confidence on the e-bike. If you're unsure about your experience level or would like additional instruction, please reach out to us ahead of time to ensure the best possible experience.
Book your tour today and explore the colorful side of Roanoke!

item.title: East Coast USA: Self-Guided Driving & Walking Tour Bundle
item.description: Explore some of the best spots for fall foliage on the East Coast, including Acadia, Shenandoah, and Great Smoky Mountains national parks, Kancamagus Highway, Blue Ridge Parkway, Bar Harbor, Newport, Salem, and the Freedom Trail, with this self-guided driving tour. Enjoy the flexibility to travel at your own pace, with hands-free functionality, turn-by-turn directions, and offline access. Includes full itineraries, travel tips, audio guide, and text.

image.alt: East Coast USA: Self-Guided Driving & Walking Tour Bundle

item.title: Roanoke Ebike Food Tour
item.description:
Get set for an unforgettable adventure that will ignite your taste buds and add a dash of thrill to your day! Our food-based tour invites you to explore the Grandin and Wasena neighborhoods, where every stop promises to deliver.
Safety is our top priority(closely followed by fun) with included helmets on, our expert guides will have you e-bike cruising in no time.
We'll kick things off on the enchanting Roanoke River Greenway, an easy and paved bike path to warm up and get into the groove. Now, here comes the fun part - the food adventure!
Not confident on an e-bike? No sweat! We've got you covered - the riding on the tour is very begineer friendly and we will take time to make sure everyone is ready before we head out! Calling all adventure-seekers, food enthusiasts, and curious souls! This tour is perfect for a fun date night, showing off your city to out-of-town pals, or simply discovering the joys of electric bike riding.

item.title: Blue Ridge Mountain E Bike Tour
item.description:
Professional Guides: Each guided ride is led by a certified and experienced guide who knows the trails intimately. They'll not only ensure your safety but also provide valuable instruction.
Tailored to You: Whether you're a complete novice or an experienced mountain biker, your guide will assess your skill level and preferences to choose a ride that matches your abilities and interests. RMA has premium e-mountain bikes from Salsa ensure you have a memorable and enjoyable ride.
Blue Ridge Views: Roanoke is nestled in the heart of the Blue Ridge Mountains, providing easy access to some breathtaking views and amazing trails and gravel roads. Whether you're looking for a serene ride through lush forests or an intro to e-bikes on offroad terrain, you'll find it here.
Safety First: Your safety is paramount. Guides are trained in first aid and they carry first aid equipment. They'll provide thorough instruction before and during the ride.

image.alt: Blue Ridge Mountain E Bike Tour

item.title: Self-Guided Scavenger Hunt: A Big Lick Of Roanoke
item.description: Check out some of the most famous landmarks, and discover some secret ones, as you make your way around Roanoke on this app-led scavenger hunt. You don’t need to follow a guide or stick to a large group tour’s itinerary. Instead, you and your group work together to answer trivia, solve challenges, and have a fun time out exploring the best of Roanoke.

image.alt: Self-Guided Scavenger Hunt: A Big Lick Of Roanoke

item.title: Complete Blue Ridge Parkway Tour Bundle
item.description:
Embark on an unforgettable journey along the Blue Ridge Parkway with Shaka Guide's Ultimate Bundle! Explore three incredible regions: Virginia, South Carolina (Asheville to Cherokee), and Blowing Rock to Asheville.
Our GPS audio tour brings this iconic roadway to life, sharing captivating stories, hidden secrets, and breathtaking vistas.
Experience the perfect blend of history, culture, and nature as you explore this iconic route like never before.
*Download the Shaka Guide app to access your purchased tours.*

image.alt: Complete Blue Ridge Parkway Tour Bundle

item.title: Blue Ridge Parkway Virginia Audio Driving Tour
item.description:
Explore the northernmost section of the Blue Ridge Parkway to discover scenic overlooks, hiking trails for all levels, and even a historic resort.
Here are just a few of the fun things you can do on the tour!
• Serene lakes and picturesque trails await at Peaks of Otter, a tranquil haven along the Parkway.
• Conquer the challenging trail to Humpback Rocks for breathtaking Shenandoah Valley views that reward your journey.
• Immerse yourself in the Parkway's history and nature at the James River Visitor Center, a gateway to understanding the region.
• Step into the past at Explore Park, where living history and interactive exhibits revive Virginia's heritage.
• Find relaxation and recreation at Sherando Lake, a serene escape perfect for swimming and picnicking.
• Witness nature's grandeur at Thunder Ridge Overlook, where sweeping vistas showcase the Parkway's beauty.
*Download the Shaka Guide app to access your purchased tours.*

image.alt: Blue Ridge Parkway Virginia Audio Driving Tour

item.title: Radical Roanoke Scavenger Hunt
item.description:
Our very unique, immersive adventures are the only ones of their kind. We, unlike other companies, provide your very own remote, interactive, live host to assist and encourage you along through your phone. We are an Austin, TX-based global custom event design company offering scavenger hunts and other events in 300+ cities in North America and beyond. Our specially hand-crafted adventures are equal parts tour, creative challenge, detective hunt, and social experiment!
Guests get to discover in an alternate reality our favorite hidden gems off the beaten trail and creatively interpret fun art, history, and culture clues - for points! They get to enjoy fame and glory while appearing on our website’s international leaderboard, no matter what their score. They get to essentially race other teams in other cities, even if they don’t have competitors who have signed up in their city that day. Get ready to discover unusual oddities, laugh out loud, and make the experience your own

item.title: Autumn E-Bike Tour
item.description:
Our electric bike adventures packs in sweeping Blue Ridge mountain views and stops along a fun but safe course that winds between some of the best Roanoke shops. After launching from the RMA shop at 11am, you'll pass through neighborhoods and village centers before crossing the river into downtown Roanoke. In addition to tracing the Roanoke River and Mill Mountain greenway trails, you'll move through the central city.
Safety is our top priority, so this activity is designed to include ample instruction as we build your skills on the e-bike. The only requirements are you be 21 years of age and know how to ride a bike. This activity is especially fun for date nights; friends visiting from out of town; introduction to electric bike riding; getting to know Roanoke if you're new to the area or are considering relocating; and/or seeing Roanoke during the holidays.
